suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to August 2025, Cindy Clayton (ID: CUST_0057) conducted a high volume of transactions, including large ATM withdrawals and deposits, with amounts consistently just below $10,000. Notably, towards the end of this period, the frequency and amount of these transactions increased significantly. This activity appears to be structured to evade reporting requirements.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: Customer has high-risk rating. Frequent large transactions, especially ATM withdrawals and deposits, are observed towards the end of the transaction log. These transactions are suspicious as they are all above $4,000 and below $10,000, indicating possible structuring to avoid reporting requirements.
